channel.title: Back from the MVP Summit
channel.description: I'm safely back from a fantastic week at the MVP Summit in Seattle / Redmond.  The week itself was very enjoyable and packed with tons of useful information - thanks to Noah and the VSTS team for being our hosts...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Adrian+00:00
item.description: So what meal did you go for on the flights this time?
item.dc:creator: Adrian

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description: Chicken. One of these days I'll go for beef...
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward

item.title: Comment by cathal+00:00
item.description: I also had flight troubles, but in my case they cancelled my Friday flights and the best they could offer me was rebooking onto Tuesday ones, so I spent an extra few days in Seattle trying my best to drink it dry.
item.dc:creator: cathal
